data.meta_description:
Editorial.

CGSC news.

Peacekeeping lessons.
Peace enforcement operations. Colonel Charles H. Swannack Jr., US Army, and Lieutenant Colonel David R. Gray, US Army
Assessing force protection risk. Lieutenant Colonel Daniel Ward, US Army, Retired
UN observer mission in Georgia. Captain Gregory R. Sarafian, US Army
Swords into plowshares: post-conflict arms management. Lieutenant Colonel James J. Carafano, US Army
Posthostilities training. Major Dominic J. Caraccilo, US Army
Beaten by the bugs: the soviet-afghan war experience. Lieutenant Colonel Lester W. Grau, US Army, Retired, and Major William A. Jorgensen, US Army Reserve

Projecting power. Prompt deterrence: the army in Kuwait. Major General Leon J. LaPorte, US Army, and Major MaryAnn B. Cummings, US Army
Restructuring the engineer initiative. Brigadier General Richard E. Coleman, US Army Reserve; Colonel David F. Melcher, US Army; Colonel Robert L. Shirron, US Army; and Colonel Gilbert L. Van Sickle, US Army Reserve
Information operations in Bosnia. Lieutenant Colonel Stephen W. Shanahan, US Army, Retired, and Lieutenant Colonel Garry J. Beavers, US Army

Insights. Managing the drawdown's human side. Major A. Cristopher St. Jean, US Army
Logistics: the past is prologue. Eric A. Orsini
Outsourcing at DOD: all it's cracking people up to be?. J. Michael Brower

Almanac. Base realignment and closure: a historical perspective. Lieutenant Colonel Michael F. Huebner, US Army, Retired

Book reviews: contemporary readings for the professional.

Index: January 1997-December 1997.
